attributes.action: immediately close down the House of Lords.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Peter Mandelson is the biggest single danger to the sovereignty of this country and since he has been lorded by Gordon Brown he can no longer be 'sacked'.  It is imperative, therefore, that the whole of the House of Lords be scrapped so that he is taken out of the parliamentary process in this land.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
